ceci-microphone-button/description: Broadcasts an audio clip recorded using your microphone.
ceci-microphone-button/clip/description: An audio clip from your microphone.
ceci-microphone-button/textcolor/descrip: Color of the text on the button's label.
ceci-microphone-button/buttonactivecolor: Background color of the button while it is being clicked or tapped.
your browser does not support recording: your browser does not support microphone recording using the WebAudio MediaRecorder.
